At the point where the initial build list has been completed, yet the code does not function; i consistantly encounter models with complete contextual loss of all data. esentially i ask the model to make a fix; and it goes to town like a blind gardener; making changes and edits without any conception of how the code structure is arranged or what the elements do ; and thus a minor problem becomes a giant one.
